ai-tha-ap373:1.1_0: Having seen a plantain, a drugged,
ai-tha-ap373:1.2_0: Regular monks offering him water for washing the feet.
ai-tha-ap373:1.3_0: Arranging his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap373:1.4_0: dropped (him) from the time I worshiped him.
ai-tha-ap373:2.1_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap373:3.3_0: it is like the In front of the Buddha:
ai-tha-ap373:3.4_0: dropped (him) from the time I worshiped him.
ai-tha-ap373:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap373:5.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap373:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
